title: The Dan Bongino Sunday Special 05/15/22
description:
First up we talked with Dinesh D’Souza about his critically important new movie 2000 Mules on the eve of it’s release. Next we talked with with Catherine Engelbrecht from True The Vote, the organization responsible for uncovering this evidence of fraud in the 2020 election. Finally we talked with Kari Lake, GOP gubernatorial candidate in Arizona,who has some very blunt comments about what happened in 2020 and how our elections can look going forward.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
